project.name: Elliott Wave 5 + Options Trading MVP - Backtesting Slice Implementation

phases.name: Phase 1: Core Infrastructure Setup
tasks: Review existing backtesting_service.py structure and identify integration points
Add vectorbt and related dependencies to pyproject.toml
Create Elliott Wave strategy module structure in domain/strategies/
Set up performance configuration for VectorBT Pro
Initialize monitoring and logging infrastructure for backtest tracking

phases.name: Phase 2: Elliott Wave Detection Implementation
tasks: Implement _simulate_elliott_wave_detection method with historical data simulation
Create fractal detection and wave pattern analysis for backtesting
Implement confidence scoring and pattern strength calculations
Add reversal type detection (bearish_top/bullish_bottom)
Create unit tests for Elliott Wave detection simulation

phases.name: Phase 3: Options Trading Simulation
tasks: Implement _generate_options_trades method with Black-Scholes integration
Create strike price calculation based on reversal signals
Implement Greeks calculation for options backtesting
Add volatility estimation from historical price data
Create options trade generation unit tests

phases.name: Phase 4: Backtest Execution Engine
tasks: Implement _execute_options_backtest with realistic transaction costs
Add position sizing logic with 3% capital allocation per trade
Implement commission, slippage, and bid-ask spread calculations
Create portfolio tracking and equity curve generation
Add trade execution simulation with entry/exit logic

phases.name: Phase 5: Performance Metrics & Analysis
tasks: Implement _calculate_performance_metrics with comprehensive metrics
Add Sharpe, Sortino, Calmar ratio calculations
Implement drawdown analysis and win rate statistics
Create trade statistics analysis methods
Add Elliott Wave and options-specific performance analysis

phases.name: Phase 6: Event Processing & Integration
tasks: Update plugin_entry.py with BacktestRequestEvent processor
Implement event routing for elliott_wave_5_options strategy type
Add BacktestCompletedEvent emission logic
Update plugin configuration with MVP features
Create integration tests for event processing

phases.name: Phase 7: Performance Optimization
tasks: Implement chunked processing for memory efficiency
Add vectorized calculations for performance metrics
Implement caching strategy with Redis/Valkey
Add parallel processing for multi-instrument backtests
Profile and optimize bottlenecks

phases.name: Phase 8: Error Handling & Recovery
tasks: Implement graceful degradation for backtest failures
Add partial results recovery mechanism
Create failure event emission for monitoring
Add comprehensive error logging and tracking
Implement retry logic for transient failures

phases.name: Phase 9: Testing & Validation
tasks: Create comprehensive unit tests for all new methods
Implement integration tests for end-to-end backtesting
Add performance benchmarking tests
Validate backtest results against expected outcomes
Test error handling and recovery scenarios

phases.name: Phase 10: Documentation & Deployment
tasks: Update API documentation with new endpoints
Document performance expectations and limitations
Create deployment checklist and verification steps
Test deployment to Modal test environment
Verify monitoring and observability setup
